noun.name: book
noun.discription: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers.

object1.name: tablet
object1.discription: in parallel with 'book', is an electronic device that can display digital versions of books and other media, often used for reading and entertainment.

object2.name: newspaper
object2.discription: in parallel with 'book', is a printed publication consisting of folded sheets, typically containing news, articles, and advertisements.

object3.name: magazine
object3.discription: in parallel with 'book', is a periodical publication containing articles, stories, photographs, and advertisements, often on specialized topics.

object4.name: comic
object4.discription: in parallel with 'book', is a printed work featuring sequences of drawings, often with dialogue and narrative, typically aimed at children or young adults.

object5.name: notebook
object5.discription: in parallel with 'book', is a bound collection of blank or lined pages, used for writing notes, sketches, or personal reflections.

object6.name: encyclopedia
object6.discription: in parallel with 'book', is a comprehensive reference work containing articles on a wide range of subjects or on many aspects of a particular field.

object7.name: manual
object7.discription: in parallel with 'book', is a guidebook or reference work providing detailed instructions or information on how to perform tasks or operate equipment.

object8.name: diary
object8.discription: in parallel with 'book', is a personal record of daily events, thoughts, and feelings, often kept in a bound journal.
